title.rendered: NEWTECONS JSC IS PROUD TO BE PARTICIPATING IN THE COMPETITION FOR SKILLED CRAFTSMEN IN CONSTRUCTION 2020

content.rendered:
Newtecons JSC is proud to be participating in the Vietnam Association of Construction Contractors (VACC) Competition for skilled craftsmen in Construction in 2020 being held on December 8-9, 2020 at Hanoi, Vietnam. Newtecons is proud to have achieved 28 awards, including 12 “Golden hands” – the highest award of the competition.

The event attracted 250 talented craftsmen from 24 prestigious Vietnam contractors to compete over 7 subjects, including: Plastering, Tiling, Reinforcement, Aluminums and glass, Plumbing, High-tech welding, and Electrical systems.

The contest is an important milestone for the construction industry, as well as the opportunity to commend all craftsmen who worked hard to create the modern buildings across Vietnam, “Mr. Nguyen Quoc Hiep, Chairman of VACC, Head of the Organizing Committee said.

In addition, Newtecons is honored to be hosting this event which is being held at The Nine Project, located at Hanoi’s strategic gateway on Pham Van Dong street, and to be participating in all 7 categories of this event.

The Nine is bringing luxurious lifestyle in the heart of the West of the capital. The Nine is currently under construction by Newtecons, and has recently been posted for sale by Savills with an expected handover of Q1/2022.
